attributes.action: Posthumously award Bill Shankly a knighthood for services to football
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I wish to make note the fact that Bill Shankly turned Liverpool FC into the Force that it is today. He needs to be recognised along with Bob Paisley.

rejection.details: We no longer accept posthumous award requests.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
